meanings.definition: A person or thing that snorts.
meanings.sent1: The pig in the farm is one of the snorters.
meanings.sent2: The horses in the field are known as snorters.
meanings.sent3: The snorters at the zoo always make visitors laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old car sounded like a snorter as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The snorters in the barn greeted us with their loud noises.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a unit of currency.
meanings.sent1: In the game, gold coins are referred to as snorters.
meanings.sent2: He saved up all his snorters to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had more snorters in my wallet right now.
meanings.sent4: She found a hidden stash of snorters under the mattress.
meanings.sent5: The beggar's cup was filled with small snorters from generous passersby.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a line of cocaine.
meanings.sent1: The dealer offered him a snorter of cocaine.
meanings.sent2: He took a quick snorter before heading to the party.
meanings.sent3: The snorter on the table caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: She refused the snorter, knowing the dangers of drugs.
meanings.sent5: The addict's only focus was getting his next snorter.
